name: What Would Make Me Feel Alive?
name_original: What Would Make Me Feel Alive?
description:
A short visual novel and our first game. Escape from a funeral home (and figure out why you're there in the first place!) in this zombie adventure.

Features multiple endings, 100% original art and music, and more glue than you'd expect.

Credits:

Programming & Writing: Clark Pohl

Art: Alex Luna https://twitter.com/unrealward

Music: Eriel Wiston

Additional music (car tune) by Alex Luna
